name: fr-api
description: Intermediary worker for communication between FR DB and Frontend

scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdirp build && babel src -d build --copy-files --include-dotfiles && cp -r node_modules package.json build/
scripts.local: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=local DEBUG=parliament-api:* nodemon --exec "node -r esm src/bin/www.js"
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev DEBUG=parliament-api:* nodemon --exec "node -r esm src/bin/www.js"
scripts.staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging DEBUG=parliament-api:* nodemon --exec "node -r esm src/bin/www.js"
